      • getAllQuestions

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,examhelper.Question> getAllQuestions()
        Returns:
        Map with an integer value that represents the id of the question and a Question object associated with it

      • createPopTables

        public static void createPopTables()
        creates and populates tables for sqlite dB can be called multiple times without adding duplicate questions or creating duplicate tables
        Pre Condition:
        should always be called when empty database is created
        Post Condition:
        should always have tables afterwards

        Parameters:
        numQues - number of questions you're requesting
        subject - subject to grab questions from
        Returns:
        boolean whether it's possible or not

      • deleteAll

        deletes all questions and resets IDs
        Post Condition:
        id's should be reset, there should be no questions left

        Parameters:

        Returns:
